core.description: Describe the reaction of ethanoic acid with: (a) metals (b) bases (c) carbonates including names and formulae of the salts produced

supplement.description: Describe the formation of ethanoic acid by the oxidation of ethanol: (a) with acidified aqueous potassium manganate(VII) (b) by bacterial oxidation during vinegar production
Describe the reaction of a carboxylic acid with an alcohol using an acid catalyst to form an ester
